column7: Focuses on the theory and practice of pricing optimization and revenue management. Topics that will be covered include: Quantity-based revenue management; Demand estimation, forecasting, and learning; Dynamic pricing; Assortment optimization. 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: IE 410, IE 411.
column9: 4 graduate hours. No professional credit. Prerequisite: IE 410, IE 411.
